entities.description: Not ready to start treatment for unmet substance use treatment need.
Not ready to stop or cut back on alcohol or drug use for unmet substance use treatment need.
Thought could handle alcohol or drug use on their own for unmet substance use treatment need.
Family, friends or religious group wouldn't like them to get treatment for unmet substance use treatment need.
Worried about being forced into treatment or rehab against their will for unmet substance use treatment need.

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent was not ready to start treatment for substance use issues.
Indicates that the respondent was not ready to stop or cut back on their alcohol or drug use.
Indicates that the respondent thought they could handle their alcohol or drug use on their own.
Indicates that the respondent's family, friends, or religious group would disapprove of them getting treatment.
Indicates that the respondent was worried about being forced into rehab or treatment against their will.
